typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as string,
		{ Gross Sales } as string,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as string,
		{ COGS } as string,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as string,
		MyCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Germany
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as string,
		{ Gross Sales } as long,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as string,
		{ COGS } as string,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as date,
		{Month Number} as short,
		{ Month Name } as date,
		Year as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Germany keyGenerate(output(CountryID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 window(over(Segment),
	desc({Units Sold}, true),
	{Units Sold_Win} = max({Units Sold})) ~> Window1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SurroData'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WindowData'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
